TEXT.TITLE: SOCIETY FOR SAVINGS <SOCS.O> FORMS PARENT
TEXT.BODY: Society for Savings Bancorp Inc said it has completed its previously announced plan of acquisition making a new Delaware-chartered bank holding company the parent of Conneticut chartered Society for Savings. Reuter
